full_text: 2017/KER/49563 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA THURSDAY, THE 7TH DAY OF DECEMBER 2017/16TH AGRAHAYANA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 7835 of 2017 () CC 924/2016 of JUDCIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, HOSDURG CRIME NO. 404/2005 OF BEKAL POLICE STATION, KASARGOD PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED 27, 42 & 48: 1. P.M. FAIZAL AGED 32 YEARS, S/O. MUHAMMED KUNHI, RESIDING AT KEEZHUR, KALANAD VILLAGE, CHANDRAGIRI POST, KASARAGOD DISTRICT - 671 317. 2. MOIDEEN KUNHI V.D, S/O. MUHAMMED KUNHI, AGED 36 YEARS, RESIDING AT VALLIYODE, MELPARAMBA, KALANAD VILLAGE, CHANDRAGIRI POST, KASARAGOD DISTRICT - 671 317. 3. ANIL S, S/O. SUMANDRAN, AGED 37 YEARS, RESIDING AT KEEZHUR KADAPPURAM, KALANAD VILLAGE, CHANDRAGIRI POST, KASARAGOD DISTRICT - 671 317. BY ADVS.SRI.T.MADHU SMT .C.R.SARADAMANT RESPONDENT (S) : THE STATE OF KERALA THROUGH THE STATION HOUSE OFFICER, BEKAL POLICE STATION, KASARAGOD DISTRICT, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM - 682 031. R BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI. ALEX M. THOMBRA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 07-12-2017, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Digi mea ete 2017/KER/49563 Cr1.MC.No. 7835 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE Al THE TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.404/2005 OF BEKAL POLICE STATION, KASARAGOD DISTRICT. ANNEXURE A2 THE TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 404/2005 OF BEKAL POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A3 THE TRUE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT DATED 25/2/2013 IN C.c NO. 986/2008 ON THE FILES OF THE LEARNED JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE'S COURT -II, HOSDURG. ANNEXURE A4 THR TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 15/12/2016 IN CRL.M.C NO.5854/2016 ON THE FILES OF THIS HONOURABLE COURT. ANNEXURE A5 THE TRUE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT DATED 28/2/2017 IN C.Cc NO.267/2013 ION THE FILES OF THE LEARNED JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE'S COURT -II, HOSDURG. RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS: NIL TRUE COPY PA TO JUDGE Scl. 2017/KER/49563 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 7" day of December, 2017 ORDER Petitioners were originally A27, A42, A48 in C.C.No.986 of 2008 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-II, Hosdurg for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 452, 427, 506 (ii) and 153 (A) IPC r/w Section 149 IPC. 2. The incident was the result of a commotion occurred between two groups. The case was the result of Annexure A2 final report in Crime No.404 of 2005 of the Bekal Police Station. 3. 38 accused faced trial in C.C.No.986 of 2008. All the said accused were acquitted for want of any evidence. None of the accused were identified. There was no evidence in the case. The case against the petitioners was split up and re- filed. Subsequently, through Annexure-4 order, this Court had quashed the case against A40 and A41. Over and above it, through Ext.A5 judgment, another accused who faced the trial BR Gets 2017/KER/49563 Cril.M.C. No.7835 of 2017 -~2- was also acquitted. 4. The case against the petitioners is pending as C.C.No.924 of 2016 before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-II, Hosdurg. Even if, the case is proceeded with, no fruitful purpose would be served and therefore, all further proceedings in C.C.No.924 of 2016 before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-II, Hosdurg based on Annexure A2 final report in Crime No.404 of 2005 of Bekal Police is liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed, and all further proceedings in C.C.No.924 of 2016 before the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-II, Hosdurg based on Annexure A2 final report in Crime No.404 of 2005 of Bekal Police are quashed Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE Scl/07.12.2017
